node.address: Barrio Bruselas Diagonal 24 #38-34, Cartagena de Indias, Bolivar , Cartagena, Colombia

content.value:
One more floor and you reach the terrace where you'll enjoy the view on the city and the bay, lying in a hammoc under the palm roof or preparing a BBQ in the small kitchen.
We leave with our children on the 2nd floor.

We are in a popular neighbourhood in front of “El Parque de Bruselas”, a familiar square where young people come to play socker.

The doble rooms are more or less 15 square meters big, they all are new. They all have a closet and a mirror, a fan and a little table. Some have shared bathroom, some private. The family room has a double and three single beds. All the hosts are allowed to use the kitchen and the terrace and the BBQ.
WI FI all over the building.

Estella and David will be happy to give some advices and share them experience.

Estella Terrace is located in Cartagena de Indias, 1.7 km from La Popa Hill Stairs, and has barbecue facilities and a terrace. The property is around 2.9 km from San Felipe de Barajas Castle and 4 km from Cartagena's Gold Museum. The rooms have a terrace with sea views and free Wi-Fi.
All rooms in the hostel have a seating area. The property has a shared kitchen.
Estella Terrace is 4.1 km from the walls of Cartagena and 4.1 km from the Palace of the Inquisition. Rafael Núñez International Airport is 4 km away.

description.description: Our hostel is set in a new 4 floors building in front of a nice square with children's playgroond and indoor sockerfeald. On the first floor is the dorm (8 beds) with its bathroom and a living room. Walking up the stairs to floor #3 we'll find three doble rooms with wooden balconies overlooking the park. And an other doble room with private bathroom giving on the mango tree. So does the family room (5spots) with private WC. The full equiped common kitchen is set on the forth floor, next to the big table under the palm roof.
